long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Altais to instantly book your patients for a video consult.  Get an advanced and comprehensive overview of your patient in the few precious minutes before the consult, saving you time by consolidating all the relevant information in a meaningful format.  Customize the layout to suit the needs of your patient or for your practice.
